name: Videocart-12: Baseball
summary: One player takes to the field, the other grabs a bat and steps up to the plate. The pitcher can throw fast, slow, and some wicked curves even at the last moment. Luckily the single-button swing action makes hitting the ball fairly easy, even if getting a single is harder than hitting a double or home-run.

videos.name: VR
videos.title: The Channel F Files VideoCart 12 Baseball!
